name: TurnTaker(DecidingTurns)
0:
”Alexa, open Turn Taker”
”Alexa, start Turn Taker”
”Alexa, play Turn Taker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: turn taker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In Turn Taker, a robot helps kids decide who gets to go first by spinning a wheel, guessing a number, or saying a rhyme.

Why it’s educational: This is great for learning strategies for taking turns in a fun, engaging way!

About SayKid
SayKid combines voice technology with tangible play to help educators and families learn together in a safe, natural, and engaging way. For more screen-less, play-based learning, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. 

If you found the skill helpful, we greatly appreciate reviews!

Awards
- SayKid wins Grand Prize in the 2020 Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
